Articles.Content:
Hi,

I have a quick question regarding the parachute and the new tweakables. Which gauge controls when the parachute semi deploys and which one controls when it fully deploys? By gauge I'm talking about the bar which has a height on and a pressure gauge on when you select the parachute, just incase you didn't know what I was talking about!

Thanks,

Jacob

Pressure controls initial deployment.

Altitude controls full deployment.
He bar on the top adjusts the altitude that the parachute will fully deploy at, the bottom bar changes the pressure the parachute will partially deploy at.
